$!You may be able to pay reduced fuel duty on some oils your business uses.$!

##Oils you pay duty on

You have to pay fuel duty on oil your business:

* uses to fuel an engine or any other type of machinery
* adds to fuel used for engines or any other type of machinery
* uses for heating

##Oils you don't pay duty on

Oils used for any other business purpose are called ’tied oils’ and you may be able to get reduced [fuel duty](http://customs.hmrc.gov.uk/channelsPortalWebApp/channelsPortalWebApp.portal?_nfpb=true&_pageLabel=pageExcise_ShowContent&id=HMCE_CL_000210&propertyType=document#P34_2717 "What uses of oil are eligible for relief from excise duty?"){:rel="external"} on these. You must have HMRC approval to pay reduced fuel duty.

##How to get approval

To get approval, complete form HO27 and return it to HMRC. The address is on the form.

$D
[Download form 'HO27: Application for approval to obtain relief from excise duty' (PDF, 47KB)](http://customs.hmrc.gov.uk/channelsPortalWebApp/downloadFile?contentID=HMCE_CL_000305 "Download form 'HO27: Application for approval to obtain relief from excise duty'(PDF, 47KB)"){:rel="external"}
$D

##Sea voyages

You can claim relief on heavy and light oils you use at sea, eg diesel or petrol, as long as:

* you don’t use inland waterways
* your ship isn’t a pleasure vessel

##How to claim

Complete form HO50 and send this back to HMRC. The address is on the form.

$D
[Download 'Form HO50: Claim for repayment of excise duty on mineral oil used on board a vessel or hovercraft (PDF 51KB)'](http://customs.hmrc.gov.uk/channelsPortalWebApp/downloadFile?contentID=HMCE_CL_000324 "Download ' Form HO50: Claim for repayment of excise duty on mineral oil used on board a vessel or hovercraft' (PDF, 51KB)"){:rel="external"}
$D

Read more about fuel relief for marine voyages on the [HMRC website.](http://customs.hmrc.gov.uk/channelsPortalWebApp/channelsPortalWebApp.portal?_nfpb=true&_pageLabel=pageExcise_ShowContent&id=HMCE_CL_000239&propertyType=document "Marine voyages - excise duty relief for mineral (hydrocarbon) oil"){:rel="external"}

##Rural fuel duty relief

You can claim this relief if you sell unleaded petrol or diesel as road fuel in:

* the Inner and Outer Hebrides
* the Northern Isles
* the Islands of the Clyde
* the Isles of Scilly

##How to claim

You must register to claim rural fuel duty relief, then complete and return form HO81 to HMRC.

$D
[Download 'Form HO80: Registration to claim fuel duty relief' (PDF, 167KB)](http://customs.hmrc.gov.uk/channelsPortalWebApp/downloadFile?contentID=HMCE_PROD1_031799 "Download 'Form HO80: Registration to claim fuel duty relief' (PDF, 167KB)"){:rel="external"}
$D

$D
[Download 'Form HO81: Claim for fuel duty relief' (PDF, 149KB)](http://customs.hmrc.gov.uk/channelsPortalWebApp/downloadFile?contentID=HMCE_PROD1_031899 "Download 'Form HO81: Claim for fuel duty relief' (PDF, 149KB)"){:rel="external"}
$D


*[HMRC]: HM Revenue & Customs

title: Apply for fuel relief
